thread.title: Nice hotel near airport
thread.title_full: Nice hotel near airport - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel San Francisco Airport North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: trustinginHim07
title: Nice hotel near airport
text: We were visiting my uncle who lived outside San Francisco. We drove up from San Diego and decided to end our California coast trip in San Francisco. The hotel was pleasant, friendly and not noisy. We love DoubleTree hotels for their comfort, service, quality and of course, their famous free, delicious and warm chocolate chip cookies. I think it was the chocolate cookies that convinced my husband to favor DoubleTree. We also LOVE their hot, delicious free breakfast included in the reservation.
